para.text: The Council shall review the list of tax havens set forth in § 47-1801.04(49)(B-i) biennially or as needed.
The Chief Financial Officer of the District of Columbia (“CFO”) may submit amendments, as the CFO considers necessary, to the Council for revision by act of the list of tax havens.
